title: Luffy uses Conqueror's Haki on Amazon Lily! Reaction Mashup
author: Multiple Reactors
description: A reaction mashup of multiple One Piece fans watching Luffy's first confirmed use of Conqueror's Haki during Episodes 412 & 413. Shows the collective shock and excitement from the community at this pivotal moment.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers only Episodes 412-413, no future spoilers

title: E176: Luffy's Family Jewels... (One Piece: Amazon Lily Review)
author: Volume One Podcast
description: The Volume One podcast reviews the Amazon Lily Arc (Chapters 514-524), discussing the introduction of Haki, Luffy's Conqueror's Haki reveal, and the significance of the Boa sisters' battle. Episode 413 is covered as part of the arc discussion.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers entire Amazon Lily arc through Episode 421

title: One Piece – Amazon Lily Arc (Episodes 406 – 421) Review
author: David Hogan
description: A critical review of the entire Amazon Lily arc covering episodes 406-421. The review discusses the arc's humor, character interactions, and pivotal moments including Luffy's Conqueror's Haki reveal in Episode 413. The reviewer gives a negative assessment, rating it 1 star.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for entire Amazon Lily arc

title: One Piece: Summit War (385-516) | E413 - A Difficult Fight for Luffy! The Snake Sisters' Haki Power!!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of Episode 413 on Crunchyroll. Watch Luffy battle the Gorgon sisters and unleash Conqueror's Haki for the first time in front of witnesses.

title: Episode 413 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 413 containing plot summary, character appearances, voice actors, production details, trivia, and manga chapter coverage. Essential reference for episode information.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Wiki may contain links and references to future episodes and events

title: One Piece: When Did Luffy Wake His Conqueror's Haki?
author: CBR
description: An article examining when Luffy first awakened and used Conqueror's Haki, discussing both the initial unconscious use in Episode 1 and the first confirmed instance in Episode 413 at Amazon Lily.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses Luffy's Conqueror's Haki awakening through Episode 413

title: Luffy Uses Conquerors Haki Episode 413
author: Various TikTok Users
description: Collection of TikTok videos discussing and showcasing Luffy's Conqueror's Haki moment from Episode 413. Includes clips, edits, and fan reactions to this iconic scene.

title: 413-415: A Difficult Fight for Luffy! The Snake Sisters' Haki Power!!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A blog post from a first-time One Piece watcher reviewing episodes 413-415, documenting their reactions to Luffy's Conqueror's Haki reveal and the battle with the Gorgon sisters.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: First-time viewer reactions to episodes 413-415 only
